metadata.constraint: Each sentence uses only words from current lesson + previous lessons
metadata.vocabulary_approach: One Serbian word per English word (no synonyms)

lessons.title: More Sports
sentences: I go to the swimming pool every day
Ja idem u bazen svakog dana
The swimming pool is big and clean
I swim in the swimming pool with my friends
Ja plivam u bazenu sa svojim prijateljima
Do you like the swimming pool
Da li ti se sviđa bazen
The swimming pool is cold but I like it
Bazen je hladan ali mi se sviđa
I play in the swimming pool every afternoon
Ja se igram u bazenu svakog popodneva
I dance with my friends at the party
Ja plešem sa svojim prijateljima na žurci
Ona ume da pleše vrlo dobro
I dance when I am happy
We dance at school every week
Mi plešemo u školi svake nedelje
I want to dance but I am tired
Ja želim da plešem ali sam umoran
Ona ume da peva vrlo dobro
I sing when I am happy
I sing and dance at the party
Ja pevam i plešem na žurci
I listen to music every day
I listen to music when I am tired
Ja slušam muziku kada sam umoran
Da li ti se sviđa hokej
My brother plays hockey at school
Moj brat igra hokej u školi
I play badminton with my friends
Ja igram badminton sa svojim prijateljima
Da li ti se sviđa badminton
Da li ti se sviđa bejzbol
I play table tennis at school
Ja igram stoni tenis u školi
Da li ti se sviđa stoni tenis
I play table tennis every day
Ja igram stoni tenis svakog dana
Table tennis is easy but football is difficult
Stoni tenis je lak ali fudbal je težak

lessons.title: Sports Actions & Equipment
sentences: I want to score a goal
He scores a goal every game
On postiže gol na svakoj utakmici
The player kicks the ball into the goal
I am happy when I score a goal
Ja sam srećan kada postignem gol
He is the best player on the team
On je najbolji igrač u timu
I want to be a good player
Ja želim da budem dobar igrač
Every player is tired after the game
Svaki igrač je umoran posle utakmice
The ball goes into the net
The net is behind the goal
The player kicks the ball over the net
The score is five to three
The score is good for our team
Skor je dobar za naš tim
He can score from far away
On može da postigne sa daleka
I am on a football team
I play for my team every week
Ja igram za svoj tim svake nedelje
Naš tim pobeđuje na svakoj utakmici
My team is the best team
Da li voliš da se klizaš
Ja mogu da se klizam vrlo brzo
Ja se klizam sa svojim prijateljima
I want to learn to skate
Ja želim da naučim da se klizam
I ride my skateboard every day
Ja se vozim na skejtbordu svakog dana
I go ice skating every winter
Ja idem na klizanje na ledu svake zime
Ice skating is difficult but beautiful
Klizanje na ledu je teško ali lepo
Da li ti se sviđa klizanje na ledu
I go roller skating in the park
Ja idem na klizanje na rolerima u parku
I roller skate with my sister
Ja se klizam na rolerima sa svojom sestrom
Da li ti se sviđa klizanje na rolerima

lessons.title: More Activities
sentences: I hop when I am happy
I hop and skip in the park
Ja skakućem i preskačem u parku
I skip to school every morning
Ja preskačem do škole svako jutro
I like to skip and hop
Ja volim da preskačem i skakućem
I practice because I want to be good
Ja vežbam jer želim da budem dobar
I practise dancing with my sister
Ja vežbam ples sa svojom sestrom
I ride my bike every day
Ja se vozim na biciklu svakog dana
Možeš li da se voziš na biciklu
I ride my skateboard in the park
Ja se vozim na skejtbordu u parku
I want to ride a horse
Ja želim da se vozim na konju
Ja se vozim sa svojim prijateljima
Ja volim da se vozim brzo

lessons.title: Entertainment & Leisure
sentences: I have fun with my friends
Ja se zabavljam sa svojim prijateljima
The party is at my house
I sing and dance at the party
Ja pevam i plešem na žurci
I have a party every year
I listen to songs every day
I sing songs with my friends
Ja pevam pesme sa svojim prijateljima
I watch films with my family
Ja gledam filmove sa svojom porodicom
I watch a movie at home
I watch films at the cinema
I go to the cinema with my friends
Ja idem u bioskop sa svojim prijateljima
I go to the cinema every month
Ja idem u bioskop svakog meseca
Ja gledam mog brata kako igra
What do you watch on TV
I watch a show on TV
I watch shows with my family
Ja gledam emisije sa svojom porodicom
I practice my hobby every day
Ja vežbam svoj hobi svakog dana

lessons.title: More Leisure Activities
sentences: I take photos with my friends
Ja slikam fotografije sa svojim prijateljima
I have pictures on my wall
I take pictures at the party
Ja se bavim slikanjem svakog popodneva
I play guitar in a band
I have a piano at home
I buy DVDs at the shop
I watch DVDs with my family
Ja gledam DVD-ove sa svojom porodicom
I listen to my CDs every day
Ja slušam svoje CD-ove svakog dana
I buy comics at the shop
I play guitar in a band
I practice with my band every week
Ja vežbam sa svojim bendom svake nedelje

lessons.title: More Food Items
sentences: I have cheese on my bread
I buy cheese at the shop
I eat cheese with my sandwich
I have tomatoes in my salad
I have carrots in my salad
I have onions in my food
Ja imam luk u mojoj hrani
I buy onions at the market
I have an orange every morning
I buy oranges at the shop
I put lemon in my water
I put tomatoes and carrots in my salad
Ja stavljam paradajz i šargarepu u salatu
I make a sandwich for lunch
I have a sandwich every day
I eat soup when I am cold
Ja jedem supu kada mi je hladno

lessons.title: Extended Food Vocabulary
sentences: I buy a burger at the shop
I have a burger for lunch
I eat pizza with my friends
Ja jedem picu sa svojim prijateljima
I buy pizza at the shop
I buy sausages at the market
I have beans with my dinner
I have peas with my food
I buy mangoes at the market
I have a mango every day
I buy pineapples at the shop

lessons.title: Food Preparation & Dining
sentences: I put food on the plate
I wash the plate after dinner
My food is on the plate
I have a cup of tea
I have coffee in my cup
I have a glass of water
I put water in the glass
I eat soup from a bowl
I put salad in the bowl
I use a fork every day
I cut food with a knife
I have a knife and fork
I cut the sandwich with a knife
I eat soup with a spoon
I use a spoon every day
I have a bottle of water
I buy a bottle at the shop

lessons.title: Seasonings & Dining
sentences: I have sauce on my food
I put sauce on my pasta
I buy sauce at the shop
I put salt on my food
I have salt on the table
I buy salt at the market
I put pepper on my food
I buy pepper at the shop
I put sugar in my tea
I put sugar on my food
I have a picnic in the park
I go on a picnic with my family
Ja idem na piknik sa svojom porodicom
I have a picnic every summer
I eat sandwiches at the picnic

lessons.title: Shopping & Commerce
sentences: I buy food at the shop
I go to the shop every day
Ja idem u prodavnicu svakog dana
The shop is near my house
Ja idem u kupovinu svake nedelje
I go shopping with my mother
Ja idem u kupovinu sa svojom majkom
I do my shopping on Saturday
I go shopping at the market
Ja idem u kupovinu na pijaci
I buy things at the shop
I want to buy a new bike
Ja želim da kupim novi bicikl
They sell food at the market
I want to sell my bike
Ja želim da prodam svoj bicikl
I buy food at the market
I go to the market every Saturday
Ja idem na pijac svake subote
They sell fruit at the market
The market is near my house
I go to the shopping centre
I buy clothes at the shopping centre
Ja kupujem odeću u tržnom centru
I go to the shopping centre every week
Ja idem u tržni centar svake nedelje
The shopping centre has many shops
I buy food at the supermarket
I go to the supermarket every week
Ja idem u supermarket svake nedelje
